value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft commercial marketplace
value.excerpt: Overview of the Microsoft commercial marketplace, including Microsoft AppSource, Azure Marketplace, offer types, and Marketplace Rewards

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

value.title: Move Azure resources to another resource group
value.excerpt: Learn how to identify Azure resources you can move, and how to move them to a new resource group.

value.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
value.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOiSRkxtTeU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CZQOxPY7UuA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

value.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and code to connect it to Azure Storage.

value.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

value.title: Describe concepts of relational data
value.excerpt: Describe concepts of relational data

value.title: Explore concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore concepts of data analytics

value.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore data ingestion in Azure

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Manage device identity with Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage device identity by using Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
value.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

value.title: Go serverless: Event-driven applications with Azure Functions | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can quickly develop and deploy code to run in the cloud with Azure Functions. Functions can be written in a variety of languages, and will automatically trigger and scale based on your application needs.  1:53 - Demo  Quickstart: Create your first function
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UFxQhszT450" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Introducing new Azure API Management capabilities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Miao Jiang joins Scott Hanselman discuss the API economy and how companies must master the challenges inherent in building, maintaining, managing, and exposing APIs to participate. That's where Azure API Management can help. Azure API Management is a solution for publishing APIs to external and internal
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/f7CJphbEmk4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 6: Describe Azure cost management and service level agreements
value.excerpt: Learn about the factors that influence cost, tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend, and how Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) can impact your application design decisions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
topItems.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

topItems.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) and how they can impact your application design decisions. Also see how to access preview services and learn how they impact your planning.

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Describe core Azure architectural components
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Subscriptions, Management Groups, Resource Groups, Resource Manager, Azure Regions, and Availability zones.

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.
